roleset.name: to tread or trample heavily
roleset.note: STOMP-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls run-51.3.2 (from stomp.01-v)

roles.note: Keep in mind 'curbstomp' has its own frame. (from stomp.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: They-1 led the Major Leagues in regular-season wins with 99 and flattened the Toronto Blue Jays four games to one for the American League pennant before [*-1] stomping their cross-bay rivals .
